channel.title: Zenith char files
channel.description: So i'm coding a zenith server, and I'm wondering how do I Chnage the character rights to make another account the main owner and not king zenith, also I would like to know how to change prices, i've done what other people have told me but nothing is working, my skype name is Matthew.freyta, Add me on skype f you can help, if you don't want to add my skype message below please.

kingkaleb782:

Youl couldn’t add me on skype could you?

I can, but I won’t spoon-feed you answers or hold your hand.

Skype: Team_Rocket_Dev

item.title: Zenith char files
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

kingkaleb782:

So i’m coding a zenith server, and I’m wondering how do I Chnage the character rights to make another account the main owner and not king zenith, also I would like to know how to change prices, i’ve done what other people have told me but nothing is working, my skype name is Matthew.freyta, Add me on skype f you can help, if you don’t want to add my skype message below please.

Well, how does your Source assign Player Rights? Is it based upon their Username on Login? Is it stored in a file? Is it stored in their Character Save File? You might just want to make the Default Rights fall on 3. This way It’s easier for you to Develop, and you don’t need to worry about the hassle of adding an additional account with Rights.

Read full topic
